      • addOrder

        @PostMapping(value="/orders/order")
public java.lang.String addOrder(@RequestParam(value="order")
                                                                      java.lang.String order,
                                                                      @RequestParam(value="username")
                                                                      java.lang.String username)

        提交订单

        参数:
        order - 订单的JSON字符串,格式

        eg:{"menu":[{"window":"1","dish":"1","number":"1"},{"window":"1","dish":"1","number":"1"}],"restaurant":"1","price":"1000","taketime":"2017-05-05 11:11:11"}

        username - 提交此订单的用户id
        返回:
        订单号

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
